Description:
Detects Obfuscated Powershell via use MSHTA in Scripts

Author: Nikita Nazarov, oscd.community
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Invoke-Obfuscation Via Use MSHTA - PowerShell Module
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where (payload like '%set%' and payload like '%&&%' and payload like '%mshta%' and payload like '%vbscript:createobject%' and payload like '%.run%' and payload like '%(window.close)%')
